mapper.select:
select swr.bizDate, ssp.vendorName, CASE WHEN swr.bizType='1' THEN "普通采购入库" WHEN swr.bizType='8' THEN "手工采购退货" WHEN swr.bizType='3' THEN "手工采购入库" ELSE "普通采购退库" end bizType, swr.createDate, swr.wrNo,case when ifnull(#{groupBy},'')='' Then '' else ifnull(smg.className,'NIL') end as groupCol, smg.className, smt.itemNo, smt.itemName, smt.spec, smu.unitName, swr.orgUnitNo, swre.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,swre.useOrgUnitNo as useOrgUnitNo, swre.price, swre.qty, swre.amt, swre.taxRate, swre.taxAmt, swre.remarks as entryRemarks, swr.creator, swr.checker,swr.prtcount+1 as prtcount, Case when swr.bizType in ('6','7','8') THEN "采购退库单" ELSE "采购入库单" end as Btype, case when swre.lineId between 1 and 10 then 10 when swre.lineId between 11 and 20 then 20 when swre.lineId between 21 and 30 then 30 when swre.lineId between 31 and 40 then 40 when swre.lineId between 41 and 50 then 50 when swre.lineId between 51 and 60 then 60 when swre.lineId between 61 and 70 then 70 when swre.lineId between 71 and 80 then 80 when swre.lineId between 81 and 90 then 90 when swre.lineId between 91 and 100 then 100 when swre.lineId between 101 and 110 then 110 when swre.lineId between 111 and 120 then 120 when swre.lineId between 121 and 130 then 130 when swre.lineId between 131 and 140 then 140 when swre.lineId between 141 and 150 then 150 when swre.lineId between 151 and 160 then 160 when swre.lineId between 161 and 170 then 170 when swre.lineId between 171 and 180 then 180 when swre.lineId between 181 and 190 then 190 when swre.lineId between 191 and 200 then 200 when swre.lineId between 201 and 210 then 210 when swre.lineId between 211 and 220 then 220 when swre.lineId between 221 and 230 then 230 when swre.lineId between 231 and 240 then 240 when swre.lineId between 241 and 250 then 250 when swre.lineId between 251 and 260 then 260 when swre.lineId between 261 and 270 then 270 when swre.lineId between 271 and 280 then 280 when swre.lineId between 281 and 290 then 290 when swre.lineId between 291 and 300 then 300 when swre.lineId between 301 and 310 then 310 when swre.lineId between 311 and 320 then 320 when swre.lineId between 321 and 330 then 330 when swre.lineId between 331 and 340 then 340 when swre.lineId between 341 and 350 then 350 when swre.lineId between 351 and 360 then 360 when swre.lineId between 361 and 370 then 370 when swre.lineId between 371 and 380 then 380 when swre.lineId between 381 and 390 then 390 when swre.lineId between 391 and 400 then 400 else 0 end linetype,swre.taxprice,receiver,swr.remarks from scminvpurinwarehsbill swr, scminvpurinwarehsbillentry swre Left Join (select c.id,b.itemId,a.className,c.standardType FROM scmmaterialgroup a, scmmaterialgroupdetail b, scmmaterialgroupstandard c WHERE a.standardId = c.id and a.id = b.classId and a.controlUnitNo=#{controlUnitNo}) smg On swre.itemId = smg.itemId
and smg.id = #{groupBy}
and smg.standardType = '1'
,scmsupplier ssp, scmmaterial smt, scmmeasureunit smu where swr.wrId = swre.wrId and swr.vendorId = ssp.id and swre.unit = smu.id and swre.itemId = smt.id and swr.wrNo = #{billNo} and swr.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY
smg.className,
swre.lineid

SELECT sob.billNo,sob.costOrgUnitNo,sob.remarks,sob.createDate,sob.bizDate, smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smu.unitName,soe.lot,soe.qty,soe.price,soe.amt, soe.remarks as entryRemarks,sob.prtcount+1 as prtcount,sob.creator,sob.checker FROM ScmCstFrmLoss sob INNER JOIN scmcstfrmlossentry soe on soe.billId=sob.id INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=soe.itemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on soe.unit=smu.id WHERE 1=1 AND sob.billNo=#{billNo} AND sob.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY soe.lineid

SELECT sob.bizDate,sob.otNo,soe.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,sob.remarks,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName, smu.unitName,sob.createDate,soe.lot,soe.qty,soe.price,soe.amt,soe.remarks as entryRemarks,sob.prtcount+1 as prtcount FROM scminvotherissuebill sob INNER JOIN scminvotherissuebillentry soe on soe.otId=sob.otid INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=soe.itemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on soe.unit=smu.id WHERE 1=1 AND sob.otNo=#{billNo} AND sob.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY soe.lineid

SELECT smb.bizDate,smm.spec,smb.createDate,smb.creator,smb.checker,smb.useOrgUnitNo, smb.otNo,smb.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,smb.remarks,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smu.unitName, sme.lot,sme.price,sme.qty,sme.amt,sme.expDate,sme.remarks as entryRemarks,smb.prtcount+1 as prtcount, case when sme.lineId between 1 and 10 then 10 when sme.lineId between 11 and 20 then 20 when sme.lineId between 21 and 30 then 30 when sme.lineId between 31 and 40 then 40 when sme.lineId between 41 and 50 then 50 when sme.lineId between 51 and 60 then 60 when sme.lineId between 61 and 70 then 70 when sme.lineId between 71 and 80 then 80 when sme.lineId between 81 and 90 then 90 when sme.lineId between 91 and 100 then 100 when sme.lineId between 101 and 110 then 110 when sme.lineId between 111 and 120 then 120 when sme.lineId between 121 and 130 then 130 when sme.lineId between 131 and 140 then 140 else 0 end linetype FROM scminvmaterialreqbill smb INNER JOIN scminvmaterialreqbillentry sme on smb.otId=sme.otId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sme.itemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sme.Unit WHERE 1=1 AND smb.otNo=#{billNo} AND smb.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo}

SELECT smb.bizDate,smm.spec,smb.createDate,smb.creator,smb.checker,smb.useOrgUnitNo, smb.otNo,smb.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,smb.remarks,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smu.unitName, sme.lot,sme.price,sme.qty,sme.amt,sme.expDate,sme.remarks as entryRemarks, case when sme.lineId between 1 and 10 then 10 when sme.lineId between 11 and 20 then 20 when sme.lineId between 21 and 30 then 30 when sme.lineId between 31 and 40 then 40 when sme.lineId between 41 and 50 then 50 when sme.lineId between 51 and 60 then 60 when sme.lineId between 61 and 70 then 70 when sme.lineId between 71 and 80 then 80 when sme.lineId between 81 and 90 then 90 when sme.lineId between 91 and 100 then 100 when sme.lineId between 101 and 110 then 110 when sme.lineId between 111 and 120 then 120 when sme.lineId between 121 and 130 then 130 when sme.lineId between 131 and 140 then 140 else 0 end linetype ,CONCAT('#$usrBiz#$',smqh1.oper) as depManager,CONCAT('#$usrBiz#$',smqh.oper) as finance FROM scminvmaterialreqbill smb INNER JOIN scminvmaterialreqbillentry sme on smb.otId=sme.otId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sme.itemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sme.Unit left join scminvmaterialrequestbillentry smqe on smqe.id=sme.sourcebilldtlid left join (select billId,oper,preStepNo from scminvmaterialrequestbilleventhistory A,scminvmaterialrequestbillentry B ,scminvmaterialreqbillentry C ,scminvmaterialreqbill D where A.billid=B.reqId and B.ID=C.sourceBillDtlId and C.otid=D.otid and D.otno=#{billNo} and D.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} order by operDate desc limit 1) as smqh on smqh.billid=smqe.reqid left join scminvmaterialrequestbilleventhistory smqh1 on smqh.preStepNo=smqh1.stepno WHERE 1=1 AND smb.otNo=#{billNo} AND smb.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo}

SELECT smb.wrNo,smb.bizDate,smb.checker,smb.creator,smb.createDate,smb.wrNo,smm.itemName, sme.wareHouseId,sme.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,sme.price,smb.prtcount+1 as prtcount, smb.remarks,smm.itemNo,smu.unitName,smm.spec,sme.qty,sme.amt,sme.expDate,sme.remarks as entryRemarks FROM scminvmoveinwarehsbill smb INNER JOIN scminvmoveinwarehsbillentry sme on sme.wrId=smb.wrId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sme.itemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sme.baseUnit WHERE 1=1 AND smb.wrNo=#{billNo} AND smb.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sme.lineid

SELECT smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName,sct.orgUnitNo,case When sctk.status='O' Then sum(sce.qty) else null end as qty, sce.taxprice, case When sctk.status='O' Then sum(sce.taxamt) else null end as taxamt,swh.whName wareHouseName,sct.createDate, sum(sce.accountQty) as accountQty, case When sctk.status='O' Then sce.taxRate else sce.taxRate end as taxRate, sce.price, case When sctk.status='O' Then sum(sce.amt) else null end as amt FROM ScmInvCountingTable sct INNER JOIN scminvcountingtask sctk on sctk.taskId=sct.taskId INNER JOIN ScmInvCountingTableEntry sce on sce.tableId=sct.tableId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sce.ItemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sce.unit INNER JOIN scminvwarehouse swh on swh.id=sct.wareHouseId INNER JOIN scminvcountingtask sca on sca.taskId = sct.taskId INNER JOIN scminvcountingtable sta on sta.tableId = sce.tableId where 1=1 AND sct.taskId =#{taskId} AND sct.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} group by sce.WareHouseID, smm.ItemNo,smm.Itemname, smm.Spec,sce.Unit,sct.CreateDate,sce.OrgUnitNo,sce.taxRate,sce.taxprice,sce.price order by sce.WareHouseID, sce.lineId,sce.id

SELECT smb.bizDate,smb.createDate,smb.wtNo,smb.outOrgUnitNo,smb.inOrgUnitNo,smb.checker, smb.creator,smb.remarks,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName,sme.lot,sme.price, sme.qty,sme.amt,sme.taxRate,sme.taxAmt,sme.remarks as entryRemarks FROM scminvmovebill smb INNER JOIN scminvmovebillentry sme on sme.wtId =smb.wtId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sme.ItemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sme.unit WHERE 1=1 AND smb.wtNo=#{billNo} and smb.finOrgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sme.lineid

SELECT srb.reqId,srb.reqNo,srb.bizDate,srb.orgUnitNo, srb.wareHouseId,srb.finOrgUnitNo,srb.invOrgUnitNo,srb.requestPerson, srb.currencyNo,srb.exchangeRate,srb.creator,srb.createDate,srb.status,srb.remarks,srb.controlUnitNo,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName, sre.*,sre.remarks as entryRemarks,srb.prtcount+1 as prtcount,srb.checker FROM ScmInvMaterialRequestBill srb INNER JOIN ScmInvMaterialRequestBillentry sre on sre.reqId =srb.reqId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sre.ItemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sre.unit WHERE 1=1 AND srb.reqNo=#{billNo} and srb.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sre.lineid

SELECT scc.useOrgUnitNo,scc.createDate,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName, sum(sce.accountQty)as accountQty,case When sct.status='O' Then sum(sce.qty) else null end as qty,scc.remarks,scc.countingPerson, scc.countingMonitorer,sce.price as price FROM scminvcountingcostcenter scc INNER JOIN scminvcountingtask sct on sct.taskId=scc.taskId INNER JOIN scminvcountingcostcenterentry sce on sce.tableId=scc.tableId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sce.ItemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sce.unit AND scc.taskId =#{taskId} AND sct.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} GROUP BY scc.UseOrgUnitNo,smm.ItemNo,smm.Itemname, smm.Spec,sce.Unit,scc.CreateDate,sce.price ORDER BY scc.UseOrgUnitNo,sce.lineId,sce.id

SELECT scc.useOrgUnitNo,scc.createDate,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName, case When sct.status='O' Then sum(sce.qty) else null end as qty,sce.taxprice,case When sct.status='O' Then sum(sce.taxamt) else null end as taxamt,scc.countingPerson,scc.countingMonitorer FROM scminvcountingcostcenter scc INNER JOIN scminvcountingtask sct on sct.taskId=scc.taskId INNER JOIN scminvcountingcostcenterentry sce on sce.tableId=scc.tableId INNER JOIN scmmaterial smm on smm.id=sce.ItemId INNER JOIN scmmeasureunit smu on smu.id=sce.unit AND scc.taskId =#{taskId} AND sct.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} GROUP BY scc.UseOrgUnitNo,smm.ItemNo,smm.Itemname, smm.Spec,sce.Unit,scc.CreateDate,sce.taxprice ORDER BY scc.UseOrgUnitNo,sce.lineId,sce.id

SELECT ssb.otNo,swh.whName as wareHouseName,ssb.bizDate,ssb.creator,ssb.checker,ssb.createDate, ssb.remarks as remarks2,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName, sse.lot,sse.qty,sse.remarks as remarks,sse.saleTaxPrice, sse.saleTaxAmt,ssb.prtcount+1 as prtcount, CASE WHEN ssb.bizType=1 then '普通销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=2 THEN '调拨销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=3 then '手工销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=4 THEN '采购方成本出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=5 then '供应方成本出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=6 THEN '普通销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=7 then '调拨销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=8 THEN '手工销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=9 then '采购方成本入库退货' ELSE '供应方成本入库退货' END AS bizType,ssb.custId, CASE WHEN ssb.bizType in (1,2,3,4,5) then "销售出库单" else "销售退库单" END as Btype, case when sse.lineId between 1 and 10 then 10 when sse.lineId between 11 and 20 then 20 when sse.lineId between 21 and 30 then 30 when sse.lineId between 31 and 40 then 40 when sse.lineId between 41 and 50 then 50 when sse.lineId between 51 and 60 then 60 when sse.lineId between 61 and 70 then 70 when sse.lineId between 71 and 80 then 80 when sse.lineId between 81 and 90 then 90 when sse.lineId between 91 and 100 then 100 when sse.lineId between 101 and 110 then 110 when sse.lineId between 111 and 120 then 120 when sse.lineId between 121 and 130 then 130 when sse.lineId between 131 and 140 then 140 else 0 end linetype FROM ScmInvSaleIssueBill ssb INNER JOIN ScmInvSaleIssueBillEntry sse on sse.otId=ssb.otId INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id = sse.itemId INNER JOIN scmMeasureUnit smu on smu.id=sse.unit LEFT JOIN ScmInvWareHouse swh on sse.wareHouseID = swh.id WHERE 1=1 AND ssb.otNo = #{billNo} And ssb.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sse.LineID ASC

SELECT ssb.otNo,swh.whName as wareHouseName,ssb.bizDate,ssb.creator,ssb.checker,ssb.createDate, ssb.remarks as remarks1,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,smu.unitName, sse.lot,sse.qty,sse.remarks as remarks,sse.saleTaxPrice,sse.saleTaxAmt,sse.taxPrice,sse.taxAmt, CASE WHEN ssb.bizType=1 then '普通销售入库' WHEN ssb.BizType=2 THEN '调拨销售入库' WHEN ssb.BizType=3 then '手工销售入库' WHEN ssb.BizType=4 THEN '采购方成本入库' WHEN ssb.BizType=5 then '供应方成本入库' WHEN ssb.BizType=6 THEN '普通销售退货' WHEN ssb.BizType=7 then '调拨销售退货' WHEN ssb.BizType=8 THEN '手工销售退货' WHEN ssb.BizType=9 then '采购方成本入库退货' ELSE '供应方成本入库退货' END AS bizType,ssb.custId,ssb.prtcount+1 as prtcount FROM ScmInvSaleIssueBill ssb INNER JOIN ScmInvSaleIssueBillEntry sse on sse.otId=ssb.otId INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id=sse.itemId INNER JOIN ScmMeasureUnit smu ON smu.id=sse.unit LEFT JOIN ScmInvWareHouse swh on sse.WareHouseID = swh.id WHERE 1=1 AND ssb.otNo = #{billNo} And ssb.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sse.LineID ASC

SELECT ssb.otNo,swh.whName as wareHouseName,ssb.bizDate,ssb.creator,ssb.checker,ssb.createDate, ssb.remarks as remarks1,smm.itemNo, case when ifnull(smm.spec,'')='' Then smm.itemName else CONCAT(smm.itemName,'(',smm.spec,')') end as itemName,smu.unitName, sse.lot,sse.qty,sse.remarks as remarks,sse.saleTaxPrice, sse.saleTaxAmt,ssb.prtcount+1 as prtcount, CASE WHEN ssb.bizType=1 then '普通销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=2 THEN '调拨销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=3 then '手工销售出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=4 THEN '采购方成本出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=5 then '供应方成本出库' WHEN ssb.bizType=6 THEN '普通销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=7 then '调拨销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=8 THEN '手工销售退货' WHEN ssb.bizType=9 then '采购方成本入库退货' ELSE '供应方成本入库退货' END AS bizType,ssb.custId, CASE WHEN ssb.bizType in (1,2,3,4,5) then "销售出库单" else "销售退库单" END as Btype, case when sse.lineId between 1 and 10 then 10 when sse.lineId between 11 and 20 then 20 when sse.lineId between 21 and 30 then 30 when sse.lineId between 31 and 40 then 40 when sse.lineId between 41 and 50 then 50 when sse.lineId between 51 and 60 then 60 when sse.lineId between 61 and 70 then 70 when sse.lineId between 71 and 80 then 80 when sse.lineId between 81 and 90 then 90 when sse.lineId between 91 and 100 then 100 when sse.lineId between 101 and 110 then 110 when sse.lineId between 111 and 120 then 120 when sse.lineId between 121 and 130 then 130 when sse.lineId between 131 and 140 then 140 else 0 end linetype FROM ScmInvSaleIssueBill ssb INNER JOIN ScmInvSaleIssueBillEntry sse on sse.otId=ssb.otId INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id = sse.itemId INNER JOIN scmMeasureUnit smu on smu.id=sse.unit LEFT JOIN ScmInvWareHouse swh on sse.wareHouseID = swh.id WHERE 1=1 AND ssb.otNo = #{billNo} And ssb.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY sse.wareHouseID,sse.LineID ASC

select smb.bizDate, smb.outOrgUnitNo, smb.inOrgUnitNo, smb.remarks, smb.createDate, smb.wtNo, smt.itemNo, smt.itemName, smt.spec, smu.unitName,smb.prtcount+1 as prtcount, smbe.lot, smbe.price, smbe.qty, smbe.amt, smbe.taxRate, smbe.taxAmt, smbe.remarks as entryRemarks from scminvmovebill smb, scminvmovebillentry smbe, scmmaterial smt, scmmeasureunit smu where smb.wtId = smbe.wtId and smbe.itemId = smt.id and smbe.unit = smu.id and smb.wtNo = #{billNo} and smb.finOrgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} ORDER BY smbe.lineid

SELECT scminvinitbill.billNo,scminvinitbill.wareHouseId,scminvinitbill.bizDate,scminvinitbill.createDate,scminvinitbill.remarks, smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,scminvinitbillentry.qty,scminvinitbillentry.taxPrice, scminvinitbillentry.taxRate,scminvinitbillentry.taxAmt,scminvinitbillentry.lot,scminvinitbillentry.remarks as entryremarks, smu.unitName,scminvinitbill.creator,scminvinitbill.checker,scminvinitbill.prtcount+1 as prtcount FROM scminvinitbill INNER JOIN scminvinitbillentry on scminvinitbill.initId=scminvinitbillentry.initId INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id=scminvinitbillentry.itemId INNER JOIN ScmMeasureUnit smu ON smu.id=scminvinitbillentry.unit WHERE 1=1 and ScmInvInitBill.orgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} and scminvinitbill.billNo= #{billNo} ORDER BY scminvinitbillentry.lineId DESC

SELECT scmcstinitbill.billNo,scmcstinitbill.orgUnitNo,scmcstinitbill.bizDate,scmcstinitbill.prtcount+1 as prtcount, scmcstinitbill.createDate,scmcstinitbill.remarks,smm.itemNo,smm.itemName,smm.spec,scmcstinitbillentry.qty, scmcstinitbillentry.taxPrice,scmcstinitbillentry.taxRate,scmcstinitbillentry.taxAmt,scmcstinitbillentry.lot, scmcstinitbillentry.remarks as entryremarks,smu.unitName,scmcstinitbill.creator,scmcstinitbill.checker FROM scmcstinitbill INNER JOIN scmcstinitbillentry on scmcstinitbill.initId=scmcstinitbillentry.initId INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id=scmcstinitbillentry.itemId INNER JOIN ScmMeasureUnit smu ON smu.id=scmcstinitbillentry.unit WHERE 1=1 and ScmcstInitBill.costOrgUnitNo = #{orgUnitNo} and ScmcstInitBill.billNo= #{billNo} ORDER BY scmcstinitbillentry.lineId DESC

SELECT A.wrNo,A.bizDate,A.vendorId,A.wareHouseId,A.createDate,A.creator,A.checker,A.bizType, B.itemId,B.unit,B.qty,B.taxPrice,B.taxAmt,B.remarks as entryRemarks,A.prtcount+1 as prtcount FROM scminvotherinwarehsbill A,scminvotherinwarehsbillentry B Where A.wrId=B.wrId And A.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} And A.wrNo=#{billNo} Order By B.lineId

SELECT A.wrNo,A.bizDate,A.wareHouseId as wareHouseName,A.createDate,A.creator,A.checker,A.bizType,smm.itemNo,A.remarks, B.itemId,ScmMeasureUnit.unitName,B.qty,B.taxPrice,B.taxAmt,B.amt,B.remarks as entryRemarks,A.prtcount+1 as prtcount,smm.itemName,B.lot,B.price FROM scminvotherinwarehsbill A,scminvotherinwarehsbillentry B INNER JOIN ScmMaterial smm on smm.id=B.itemId ,ScmMeasureUnit Where A.wrId=B.wrId And A.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} And A.wrNo=#{billNo} and B.unit=ScmMeasureUnit.id Order By B.lineId

SELECT A.otNo,A.bizDate,B.wareHouseId,A.createDate,A.creator,A.checker,A.prtcount+1 as prtcount, B.itemId,B.unit,B.qty,B.taxPrice,B.taxAmt,B.reqFinOrgUnitNo,B.remarks as entryRemarks FROM scminvotherissuebill A,scminvotherissuebillentry B Where A.otId=B.otId And A.orgUnitNo=#{orgUnitNo} And A.otNo=#{billNo} Order By B.lineId
